name: Matter of Fact Software
description: ISV focussed on the IBM Mainframe
overview:
Matter of Fact Software develops software for the IBM mainframe platform. Its Directors have many decades of real-world experience in the arena.

PlexSpy, the companies first product, provides unique insights into application infrastructure making problem diagnosis quicker in the event of operational issues. It can also be used by less experienced support staff owing to its ease of use, avoiding the need to contact second or third line CICS support staff so often.

The companies second product, CICS JS/Server, allows the Dojo Javascript Toolkit to be served up from the mainframe. This extends the strengths of the platform to the supply if the Dojo Toolkit to corporate business applications.

external_links.title: Monitor System z CICS on an iPad
